title: Document Performance Feedback
description: A manager wants to document a piece of positive feedback for an employee in the performance management system outside of the formal review cycle.

tasks.description: Navigate to the performance management module in the HRIS.
Select the employee and choose the option to add 'anytime feedback'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager finds the correct feature in the system.

tasks.description: Enter the positive feedback and save it to the employee's record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully logs the feedback, which will be visible during the next formal review.
